Articles.Content:
I have been searching and searching for a long time for a KSP Discord, but have only found the Subreddit Discord (bleh), Dev Discord (redundant now), and various YouTubers’ Discord servers. Is there an official one that I’m just missing?

Edited Thursday at 12:58 AM by Kerbalsaurus
There was an official KSP Discord but it has been turned over to its moderators and is no longer affiliated with any business.

@Kerbalsaurus

This is the official discord (not so official now with what has happened to KSP2 development):
https://discord.gg/interceptgames
 

This is the unofficial r/kerbalspaceprogram  discord that has been around for a very long time:
https://discord.gg/FKSbMUvu
